lines.text: Boy, I'll pick you up about same time tomorrow, little before daybreak.
All right, maybe we'll catch some fish this time and we'll have better luck.
Momma? Momma, please don't hurt me momma!
Hell man, I'm lookin' t' buy some WEED...
Hell, I'd rather take a pretty girl out into the woods than some HAIRY LEGGED OLD MAN!
